To update this Item, continue on your

settings_about_header.description: Header for the about section in settings

settings_about_thank_you.message:
Thank you for using 2FAS Pass, 
a Source-available project with cybersecurity at its heart.
settings_about_thank_you.description: Thank you message for users of the 2FAS Pass extension

settings_about_thank_you_subheader.message:
We do not keep your data. 
We have no servers.
settings_about_thank_you_subheader.description: Subheader emphasizing the privacy and security of the extension

settings_about_thank_you_description.message: We do not store your Items as we have no servers. You keep all of your Items in your 2FAS Pass mobile app. The ones you choose may also be stored in this Browser Extension. You decide when and how you use them.
settings_about_thank_you_description.description: Explains that user data is stored in the mobile app or optionally in the extension

settings_privacy_policy.description: Link to the privacy policy of 2FAS Pass

settings_eula.description: Link to the End User License Agreement for 2FAS Pass

settings_lets_connect.description: Prompt to connect with the 2FAS Pass team or community

settings_save_prompt_header.description: Header for the save login prompt settings

settings_save_prompt_description.message: Choose how you want to be prompted to save your Item details.
settings_save_prompt_description.description: Description for configuring the save login prompt behavior

settings_save_prompt_pass.description: Option to use the 2FAS Pass-specific save login prompt

settings_save_prompt_pass_encrypted.description: Option to use the 2FAS Pass encrypted save login prompt

settings_save_prompt_browser.description: Option to use the browser's default save login prompt

settings_save_prompt_none.description: Option to disable save login prompts

settings_safe_browsing.description: Option to enable safe browsing in Chrome

settings_safe_browsing_reports.description: Option to send safe browsing reports to Chrome

settings_only_on_restart.description: Option to clear data only on browser restart

settings_don_t_clear.description: Option to disable automatic data clearing

settings_after_1_minute.description: Option to clear data after 1 minute of inactivity

settings_after_5_minutes.description: Option to clear data after 5 minutes of inactivity

settings_after_15_minutes.description: Option to clear data after 15 minutes of inactivity

settings_after_30_minutes.description: Option to clear data after 30 minutes of inactivity

settings_after_60_minutes.description: Option to clear data after 60 minutes of inactivity

settings_idle_lock_header.message: Automatically lock the Browser Extension when idle
settings_idle_lock_header.description: Header for the idle lock settings

settings_idle_lock_description.message: Select the time after which the Browser Extension will automatically lock itself if you don't use it.
settings_idle_lock_description.description: Description for configuring idle lock behavior

settings_idle_lock_tooltip_1.description: Tooltip explaining that the idle lock setting applies only to the extension

settings_idle_lock_tooltip_2.message: This feature automatically locks the extension and clears all Items that have been transferred from your mobile app after the period of inactivity you set above.
settings_idle_lock_tooltip_2.description: Tooltip clarifying that the idle lock setting does not affect the mobile app

settings_idle_lock_tooltip_3.message: You can choose to lock it manually, automatically after a set amount of time, or when you restart the browser. Idle time refers to the inactivity of the whole computer, not only the browser.
settings_idle_lock_tooltip_3.description: Tooltip explaining that the idle lock function only applies to the extension

settings_auto_clear_clipboard_header.description: Header for the auto clear clipboard settings

settings_auto_clear_clipboard_descriptio.message: Select a time to clear the clipboard of data copied from this Browser Extension.
settings_auto_clear_clipboard_descriptio.description: Description for configuring clipboard auto-clear behavior

settings_auto_clear_clipboard_tooltip_1.description: Tooltip explaining that the auto-clear setting applies only to data copied from the extension

settings_auto_clear_clipboard_tooltip_2.message: The “Auto Clear Clipboard” function automatically clears the clipboard contents after a specified period (can be changed above). This prevents the password from being permanently stored there.
settings_auto_clear_clipboard_tooltip_2.description: Tooltip clarifying that the auto-clear setting does not affect data copied from outside the extension

settings_auto_clear_clipboard_tooltip_3.message: NOTE: This function has built-in browser limitations. For the clipboard to be cleared, the browser must be open and active; otherwise, it won't work.
settings_auto_clear_clipboard_tooltip_3.description: Tooltip explaining that the auto-clear function only applies to data copied from the extension

settings_shortcut_firefox_tooltip.description: Tooltip explaining how to configure shortcuts in Firefox via browser settings

settings_shortcut_safari_tooltip.message: To set or change this shortcut, go to your browser settings, extensions, 2FAS Pass Browser Extension, then change the shortcut in the provided field.
settings_shortcut_safari_tooltip.description: Tooltip explaining how to configure shortcuts in Firefox via browser settings
